sub: A new gene has appeared on Earth

And because of that, some humans were
born mutant

A great war was fought between
humans and mutants

And in the end, the humans
were victorious
The few mutant suvivors had to hide

But they are hunt by an
organization

Me and my sister were
abandoned when we were children

When our parents discovered that we
were... different

A decade has gone since the great
war's end

And the world slowly started to be
rebuilt

We managed to adjust ourselves
as we could
